data.title: Kesarina Kamala
data.text:
Kesarina Kamala (Kannada: à²à³à²¸à²°à²¿à²¨ à²à²®à²², English: Lotus of Mud) is a 1973 Indian Kannada drama movie, directed by R. N. Jayagopal and produced by T. N. Narasimhan. The film stars Kalpana, Shringar Nagaraj and Uma Shivakumar in the lead roles. The film has musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar, who introduced Vani Jairam to Kannada Film Industry through this movie.[1]
